definitions: the action of clearing someone of blame or suspicion

examples.text: I intend to work to ensure my full vindication
today's news is a complete vindication for us

shortDefinitions: act of clearing someone of blame or suspicion

definitions: proof that someone or something is right, reasonable, or justified

examples.text: the results were interpreted as vindication of the company's policy
democratic vindications of freedom of choice as a basic principle

shortDefinitions: proof that someone or something is right
